markdownRemark.html:
NodeJS Architecture Pattern

Factors to scale

  • Exteranl Scale

  • Traffic Increase

    • Direct effect: The most obvious direct effect is overloading your servers’ capacity to handle incoming traffic.

    • Indirect effect:

      1. An increase in traffic can affect your application indirectly by overloading one of your internal processes.
      2. An increase in traffic starts affecting the performance of a service you share with other platforms
